Professional Perspectives is an executive search and placement firm headquartered in Denver Colorado. We specialize exclusively in the industries of Accounting and Finance, Executive, IT, Healthcare, BioPharma, HR and Real Estate. Full life cycle recruitment:• Provide full life cycle recruitment support at all levels from early in career to executive• Consult and educate business partners on hiring process, compensation analysis and employment market trends• Administer technical assessments, structured screening, behavioral interviewing, salary negotiation, candidate closure and new hire orientation* Salesman of the Year Award 2015 *

- Successful recruitment in Solar and Renewable Energy, Aerospace and Defense, Optics, Engineering, Oil & Gas, IT, and Medical Manufacturing industries.• Experienced in high volume recruiting/sourcing and account management.• Energetic and results-driven to find and place top talent; senior level aptitude at gathering andvalidating requirements, sourcing, screening, interviewing, salary negotiation, and closing ofqualified candidates.• Exceptional networking skills; able to generate credibility and build long-term relationships withall level candidates through strong interpersonal and communication skills.• Proven leadership, communication and relationship building skills at all levels of an organization.

We focus our efforts to assist clients staffing a temporary need, a seasonal spike in their business cycle or when using Synergy Staffing Inc to augment their staff on a contract, contract-to-hire or direct hire placement basis. Synergy Staffing Inc has the expertise and dedication to provide clients with top industry professionals to timely and effectively secure their staffing needs. We are extremely dedicated to our candidates in providing them the best advice, support and direction during their job search.• Open, develop and maintain client accounts in mortgage, banking, telecommunications and healthcare industries by consulting with my clients about their talent acquisition strategies and help identify gaps within their workforce planning processes.  • Demonstrate excellent customer service in order to retain and build rapport with key clients, including maintaining day to day communication, delivering key information and leading efforts to perfect client listings.

Accomplished talent acquisition professional with a proven ability to identify key resources and develop strategic recruitment campaigns. Exhibits a tenacious work ethic and exemplary communication skills. Self-driven and results-oriented, owns a deep knowledge of the development and execution of large and small scale recruitment strategies / tactics that deliver immediate results to Business Managers and Client Partners.Specialties: Healthcare, Healthcare IT, HIT, Informatics, Consulting, Non-profit, Corporate Recruiter, Society of Human Resource Management, HIMSS, Taleo, Modis, EMR, EHR, Epic, Allscripts, Cerner, McKesson, Meditech, Informaticists, RN, Physicians, AdvisoryCorporate Recruitment, Change Management, Human Capital Management, Talent Identification, Employee Relations, Retention, Talent Management, Recruiting, Leadership, Behavioral-based Interview Techniques, Information Technology, Talent Acquisition.• Identify potential candidates through the use of intricate Boolean searches, user groups, candidate referrals, networking, and web sourcing.• Leverage diverse approaches to recruit passive and active candidates through online social networking, job boards, professional networking, and phone work.
University of Colorado at Denver and Health Sciences Center

-Participated in the investigation, execution, analysis and evaluation of the safety and effectiveness of buprenorphine in the presence of naltrexone for the treatment of cocaine dependence.• Responsible to pre-screen candidates with detailed phone screens, interview and evaluatecandidates compatibility with protocol requirements to ensure a right fit prior to submission to themedical team.• Handle all appropriate follow ups with candidates and participants to build meaningful andproductive relationships in a friendly and polite manner.• Coordinates with principle investigators, CTB therapists and/or research coordinators to verify the reported trial data is accurate, complete, and verifiable from source documents, as well as to establish compliance with the currently approved protocol and CTN.• Responsible to review protocol with participants for Clinical Trials Network to provide study information to interested callers and gather pertinent information as appropriate.• Attend study conference calls and contribute to interdisciplinary team meetings relating to clinical investigational drug trials by providing site-specific information.• Assist staff with study recruitment, advertising, presentations, acquisition of supplies, inventory management, bookkeeping and strategic planning to verify that source data/documents and other trial records are accurate, complete, and maintained.

-Provide psychosocial rehabilitation including supported employment and educational support to individuals with schizophrenia or other psychotic disorders.• Assess level of aspiration, interest, motivation, aptitude and scholastic achievement by recommending appropriate areas of training and coaching.• Self-manage multiple employment opportunities by sourcing, screening, coordinating interviews,negotiating and closing candidates for employers.
